title: These are Apple’s upcoming kids and family-friendly shows coming to TV+
content:
There’s no shortage of new content on Apple TV+ this summer for kids. Apple TV+ has announced its summer lineup for kids featuring new original series, specials, shorts, and returning favorites.

more…

The post These are Apple’s upcoming kids and family-friendly shows coming to TV+ appeared first on 9to5Mac.
